## don't do this

```{r}
df <- tibble( x = rnorm(100), y = runif(100), z = rpois(100, 1))
M = multiverse()
```


```{multiverse default-m-2, inside = M}
df <- branch(some,
        "1" ~ select(df, -x),
        "2" ~ mutate(df, x = exp(x))
    )
```


```{r}
execute_multiverse(M)
```



## do this

```{r}
M = multiverse()
```


```{multiverse default-m-1, inside = M}
df <- tibble( x = rnorm(100), y = runif(100), z = rpois(100, 1))

df <- branch(some,
        "1" ~ select(df, -x),
        "2" ~ mutate(df, x = exp(x))
    )
```


```{r}
execute_multiverse(M)
```


```{r}
expand(M)
```
